title: Fully Expandable and Customizable Create Gantry Crop Farm Tutorial | Minecraft Create Mod 1.20

tasks.task: Building a fully automatic, expandable, and customizable Create Crop Farm using the Gantry Carriage System.
subtasks: Place the Gantry Carriage on one end of the Gantry Shaft.
Attach Linear Chassis to the Gantry Carriage.
Position Harvesters on both sides of the Linear Chassis.
Install Redstone Contacts on both ends of the Gantry Carriage.
Connect Redstone Links to the Redstone Contacts.
Ensure proper storage and portable storage interface for output.
Skip planting one block at each end of the Gantry Shaft to avoid uprooting crops.
Connect the Gantry Shaft to two normal shafts and the Gear Shift.
Set up a Toggle Power Latch for the Gear Shift (with an off switch if desired).
Configure unique redstone frequency to avoid interference.
Activate the machine using a lever.
Set up output chute and chest to collect harvested crops.

tasks.task: Building the crop farm. Then, breaking it down:
this would be another subtask. MAINTASK: Setting up the redstone system.
Constructing the fully automatic crop farm.
Building the Gantry Carriage System-based Crop Farm.
Building a fully automatic, expandable, and customizable Create Crop Farm using the Gantry Carriage System.
Building a Create Crop Farm with Gantry Carriage System**
